Fri, 01 Nov 2024 19:52:42 +0000 A crash, at the corner of Lake and Horotata Rds in Hauraki, left one person in a serious condition, two with moderate injuries, and another in a minor condition. It was reported to police about 5.50am. Photo / Hayden Woodward
